mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bank_account( id, type, name, bank_name, province, city, district, branch, account, account_certification ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{name}, #{bankName}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{branch}, #{account}, #{accountCertification} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE type = VALUES(type), name = VALUES(name), bank_name = VALUES(bank_name), province = VALUES(province), city = VALUES(city), district = VALUES(district), branch = VALUES(branch), account = VALUES(account), account_certification = VALUES(account_certification);
